error-codes.REGISTER_NAME_INVALID: Name is containing not excepted characters.
error-codes.REGISTER_SURNAME_INVALID: Surname is containing not excepted characters.
error-codes.REGISTER_USERNAME_INVALID: Username can contain only A-Z0-9_ characters.
error-codes.REGISTER_PASSWORD_INVALID: Password must contain 1 big letter, 1 small letter, 1 number and must be minimum 8, maximum 64 characters.
error-codes.REGISTER_NOT_ACCEPTED_TERMS: You must accept terms and policy.
error-codes.LOGIN_LOGIN_IS_INVALID: Username / E-mail or Password is invalid.
error-codes.LOGIN_EMAIL_NOT_VERIFIED: You haven't verify your e-mail. Check your e-mail we sent a new verification!
error-codes.EMAIL_VERIFICATION_INVALID_TOKEN: This link is broken, please try login again.
error-codes.RECAPTCHA_NOT_VALID: Beep boop, we don't allow robots.
error-codes.RESET_PASSWORD_NEW_PASSWORD_INVALID: New password must contain 1 big letter, 1 small letter, 1 number and must be minimum 8, maximum 64 characters.
error-codes.RESET_PASSWORD_NEW_PASSWORD_DOESNT_MATCH: New password and repeat are not same!
error-codes.RESET_PASSWORD_NEW_PASSWORD_REPEAT_INVAL: New password repeat must contain 1 big letter, 1 small letter, 1 number and must be minimum 8, maximum 64 characters.
error-codes.RESET_PASSWORD_INVALID_TOKEN: This link is broken, please request new password again.
error-codes.NETWORK_ERROR: Network error, please check your internet connection.

success-codes.REGISTERED_SUCCESSFULLY_CHECK_YOUR_EMAIL: Successfully registered! Please check your e-mail for verification.
success-codes.EMAIL_VERIFIED_SUCCESSFULLY: E-Mail verified successfully! Now you can login.
success-codes.EMAIL_SENT_SUCCESSFULLY: E-Mail sent successfully! Please check your e-mail.

home.title: Take notes easily.
home.description: A note application which allows you to add, edit and share personal notes, collaborate with your friends and moreover discover other people notes.

form.name: Name
form.terms-and-policies-text: I accept terms and policies.

activate-email.title: Verify E-Mail
activate-email.description: To login your account please verify your E-Mail address.

delete-account-form.delete-my-account-permanently: Delete my account and all data permanently.
